meanings.definition: The activity or hobby of collecting rocks and minerals.
meanings.sent1: Rockhoundings can be a fun way to explore nature and learn about different types of rocks.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy rockhoundings as a way to relax and unwind in the outdoors.
meanings.sent3: During our rockhoundings adventure, we found a sparkly rock that made us all smile.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for rockhoundings was like a treasure hunt that never ended.
meanings.sent5: The joy of rockhoundings is in the discovery of unique and beautiful rocks.

meanings.definition: The act of searching for rocks and minerals as a recreational activity.
meanings.sent1: Exploring the forest for hidden gems is a thrilling part of rockhoundings.
meanings.sent2: Families often bond over the shared excitement of rockhoundings trips.
meanings.sent3: We laughed as our rockhoundings expedition turned into a friendly competition.
meanings.sent4: In the world of rockhoundings, every stone has a story waiting to be uncovered.
meanings.sent5: The magic of rockhoundings lies in the thrill of the hunt for precious stones.
